entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
